metadata.name: Suspicious Execution of InstallUtil Without Log
metadata.comment: Uses the .NET InstallUtil.exe application in order to execute image without log

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\installutil.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('microsoft.net\\framework')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/logfile= ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/logtoconsole=false')))

output.summary: Uses the .NET InstallUtil.exe application in order to execute image without log
